about_the_game:
OVERVIEW

Squid Squabble is a top-down multiplayer arena shooter where players gather single-use items to eliminate each other. Each team has an inkwell that slowly drains, which they can refill by defeating other players and depositing their ink. Make sure that your inkwell doesn't run dry, or you won't be able to respawn anymore. With only one HP and limited items, players must scramble to vanquish their enemies and become the last squid standing.

FEATURES

  • Online and Local Multiplayer: Play with up to 8 people over the internet or right on your couch. There are up to 4 teams with 2 players each.
  • Unique Items and Arenas: Fight in diverse arenas that pose unique challenges, using a familiar arsenal to attack, defend, and outplay. Rare and devastating Power Items may occasionally appear to turn the tide of the match (literally).
  • Physics-Based Interactivity: Items are designed to interact with each other, meaning you can deflect an enemy attack and bounce it off the wall straight into a whirlpool, where it is sucked in to destroy any enemy at the center.
  • Customization: Squid Squabble provides a customizable experience with full keyboard-mouse and controller support, player cosmetics, and even the ability to change the color of each team to whatever you want.
  • And Most Importantly... Adorable little squids for you to obliterate.
detailed_description:
OVERVIEW

Squid Squabble is a top-down multiplayer arena shooter where players gather single-use items to eliminate each other. Each team has an inkwell that slowly drains, which they can refill by defeating other players and depositing their ink. Make sure that your inkwell doesn't run dry, or you won't be able to respawn anymore. With only one HP and limited items, players must scramble to vanquish their enemies and become the last squid standing.

FEATURES

  • Online and Local Multiplayer: Play with up to 8 people over the internet or right on your couch. There are up to 4 teams with 2 players each.
  • Unique Items and Arenas: Fight in diverse arenas that pose unique challenges, using a familiar arsenal to attack, defend, and outplay. Rare and devastating Power Items may occasionally appear to turn the tide of the match (literally).
  • Physics-Based Interactivity: Items are designed to interact with each other, meaning you can deflect an enemy attack and bounce it off the wall straight into a whirlpool, where it is sucked in to destroy any enemy at the center.
  • Customization: Squid Squabble provides a customizable experience with full keyboard-mouse and controller support, player cosmetics, and even the ability to change the color of each team to whatever you want.
  • And Most Importantly... Adorable little squids for you to obliterate.
name: Squid Squabble

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 screen recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 screen recommended

short_description: A high-octane top-down shooter where players fight over limited ink that allows them to respawn. Squabble online or locally, wielding single-use items to destroy your enemies and become the last squid standing.
